This is a simple SMS/MMS Backup app. This app REQUIRES ROOT.
This app makes a direct copy of of your MMSMS data and stores it on your ExternalStorage. Doing this leaves this data open any and all other pieces of software.

Source for this application can be found here: www.github.com/jug6ernaut/mmsmsbackup/
